item.title: Altcoin Rally: ADA, SOL, MATIC, and XLM Shoot 25-50% After Ripple Lawsuit Outcome
item.dc:creator: Bhushan Akolkar
item.description:
The broader cryptocurrency market is cheering the big win for Ripple in the SEC lawsuit with most of the altcoins witnessing a parabolic rally along with the XRP Price surge. Altcoins like Cardano (ADA), Solana (SOL), Polygon (MATIC), and Stellar (XLM) have skyrocketed the most each gaining anywhere between 25-50%. With XRP not getting the

The post Altcoin Rally: ADA, SOL, MATIC, and XLM Shoot 25-50% After Ripple Lawsuit Outcome appeared first on CoinGape.

item.title: XRP Price Shoots 60% In Hours With Huge Whale Activity, FOMO Kicking In?
item.dc:creator: Bhushan Akolkar
item.description:
It’s been a historic day for the XRP community and the broader crypto market after the Southern District Court of New York concluded that the programmatic sales of Ripple’s XRP and other distributions didn’t constitute the sale of investment contracts. The court ruling has been the major catalyst to send the XRP Price to the

The post XRP Price Shoots 60% In Hours With Huge Whale Activity, FOMO Kicking In? appeared first on CoinGape.

item.title: Cardano Founder Says XRP Win is “One Giant Leap for Cryptocurrencies”
item.dc:creator: Godfrey Benjamin
item.description:
The positive Summary Judgment in Ripple Labs vs US SEC lawsuit has drawn comment and accolades from top personalities in the Web3.0 world including Cardano founder, Charles Hoskinson. Cardano Founder Sees Win as One for the Industry The Cardano founder believes the verdict from Judge Analisa Torres is a big win for the entire industry.

The post Cardano Founder Says XRP Win is “One Giant Leap for Cryptocurrencies” appeared first on CoinGape.

item.title: Breaking: US FTC Probing ChatGPT Over False Information
item.dc:creator: Anvesh Reddy
item.description:
Crypto Market News: The United States Federal Trade Commission (FTC) had reportedly sent a letter to OpenAI, the company behind the highly popular artificial intelligence based chatbot ChatGPT, over claims that the system published fake information. The agency claims that the company might have potentially violated consumer protection laws with the publishing of inaccurate data,

The post Breaking: US FTC Probing ChatGPT Over False Information appeared first on CoinGape.

item.title: Breaking: Alex Mashinsky Arrested As US SEC, DOJ, CFTC And FTC Filed Lawsuits Against Celsius Network
item.dc:creator: Varinder Singh
item.description:
The U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC) has filed a lawsuit against bankrupt crypto lender Celsius Network and its founder and former CEO Alex Mashinsky, according to a court filing on Thursday. Following the court filing, Alex Mashinsky was arrested on Thursday morning following an investigation into the company’s collapse, Bloomberg reported citing a person

The post Breaking: Alex Mashinsky Arrested As US SEC, DOJ, CFTC And FTC Filed Lawsuits Against Celsius Network appeared first on CoinGape.

item.title: Terraform Labs Sells Crypto Ahead Of Ruling In US SEC Vs Terra And Do Kwon
item.dc:creator: Varinder Singh
item.description:
Terraform Labs, co-founded by Do Kwon and Daniel Shin, sold 110,000 Convex Finance (CVX) tokens worth nearly $450,000 in the last two days. In May, Terraform Labs moved 1.8 million CVX tokens worth nearly $8.7 million to a wallet address starting with “0x15A5” after 277 days of inactivity. Terraform Labs is one of the largest

The post Terraform Labs Sells Crypto Ahead Of Ruling In US SEC Vs Terra And Do Kwon appeared first on CoinGape.
